title: Modern 1 bedroom available !!!
posting_body: ['We are LincolnSM', 'Apartments located in the heart of Santa Monica.', 'We offer bright beautiful 1 bedroom and studio apartments.', 'The apartments are fully modern and come with stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, stove/oven microwave &dishwasher), a large tiled bathroom, and hardwood-inspired flooring throughout.', 'PARKING IS ALSO INCLUDED FOR THE 1 BEDROOMS!', 'Other amenities include air conditioning/heating, an on-site laundry room, Amazon Hub Lockers, and onsite maintenance.', 'We are cat-friendly!', 'With a pet deposit of $350 (Sorry but dogs are not allowed).', "We also have popular restaurants on-site such as Pono Burger, Sweet Fin Poke, Jersey Mike's Subs, and Fresh Brothers.", 'All of this and a convenient location to everything Santa Monica has to offer within walking distance!', 'All leases are for 12 Months (no short-term leases or subletting permitted).', 'There is a non-refundable application fee of $49 per lease and a $500 holding fee is required(holding fee goes toward the total security deposit).', 'The security deposit is only $1000 (upon approved credit).', "We can't wait to meet you in person, but in the meantime, check us out online.", 'Please visit our website: <URL> to view a Virtual tour of our property.', 'Click on the Youtube link on the top of the screen to get started!', 'The leasing office is open from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm Monday through Saturday.', '-Elfa Closet System', '-Washbox Dry Cleaning Service', '-Private Balconies', '-Controlled Access', '-Emergency Maintenance', '-Elevator Access', '-Online Payments Available', '-Subterranean Controlled Access Parking', '-Hardwood-Inspired Floors', '-Courtesy Patrol', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Seating Areas', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'IMPORTANT INFORMATION We are part of the affordable housing program through the City of Santa Monica, and therefore must follow their guidelines on income & rent restrictions.', 'We are an income-restricted property, the income restrictions are as follows and include pre-tax wages and 10% of certain assets combined', 'Amount listed is maximum allowable:', '1 Person - $82,800', '2 Persons- $94,600', '3 Persons- $106,400', 'Call us for more details about our income requirements.', 'We are professionally managed by Sares-Regis Group and we are an equal housing opportunity provider.', 'CA Bureau of Real Estate License #01319176', 'Pictures are of model units (actual units available may have a slightly different layout)', 'Pricing subject to change']
